snippet: KULIK--Dominic. The Horace Mann School community profoundly mourns the sudden loss of our beloved alumnus, parent and Trustee, Dominic Kulik, Horace Mann 1982. Always an active and loyal member of the HM community, particularly as a young gifted athlete and record setting - Varsity swimmer, Dominic returned to HM first as a dedicated parent and then as an active member of the Horace Mann Board of Trustees, serving from May 2012 into his current term. A deeply devoted family man, Dominic was married to Lorraine Kayton Kulik '82 and was the loving father of Dante '15 and Nakai. Passionate about environmental sustainability and corporate social responsibility, he pursued these causes both professionally and personally. Dominic's insight, and his caring and thoughtful attention to his work on behalf of Horace Mann are irreplaceable. May the Kulik family -- Dominic's beloved parents Alan and Nancy Kulik, brothers Dr. Alfred Kulik and Glen Kulik and their children, and his sister, our dear friend Regina Kulik Scully HM '81 and John Scully -- be comforted in the vibrant memory of Dominic Kulik. Horace Mann extends its heartfelt condolences and sympathy to his grieving family and to his many friends. "We mourn alongside you." In lieu of flowers, gifts can be made to the boys' college fund at the following link: https://www.gofundme.com/ jrvuegs4 Michael Colacino '75 Chair, Horace Mann Board of Trustees Thomas M. Kelly, Ph.D. Horace Mann Head of School 1/3
